document_title: Pork tapeworm infection: Causes, symptoms, treatment, prevention
subsection_content:
To diagnose pork tapeworm larvae, the doctor will base and prescribe the following methods:
Based on epidemiological factors: living in the disease area; Blood tests: consider eosinophilia.; Diseases of the skin and muscles: diagnosed by biopsy method.; Eyes: use ophthalmoscope; Brain: diagnosed using CT scan, MRI (magnetic resonance) techniques to find abnormal images; Calcified round spots, ring-like circles, cerebral edema can be seen.; Immunodiagnosis.
subsection_title: nhiem au trung san lon.json. Diagnostic method
